name: API Sync
description: Automates exporting/importing to/from remote REDCap servers via the API.  The Data Dictionaries for the local and remote projects are expected to be either identical or compatible.  This module could easily be expanded to support additional scenarios (like automatically syncing the data dictionary as well).

project-settings.name: Disable error notification emails to superusers on the project (or the general system admin email if there are none on the project).
Log request contents (only enable temporarily for debugging)

Exports
Exports overwrite remote data with local data. Automatic exports of fields changed since the last export (according the the 'Logging' page) can be configured below. Initial exports (or exports delayed due to misconfiguration or cron issues) will only sync changes up to one week ago for performance reasons. All records may also be exported at once via the API Sync page/link in the left menu.

Export Every Minute
• Overrides the daily/hourly options below

Daily/Hourly Export Minute (0-59)
• The minute on which daily or hourly exports will occur
• If omitted, neither daily nor hourly exports will occur

Daily Export Hour (0-23)
• The hour on which daily exports will occur
• If omitted, exports will occur hourly
  (unless Export Every Minute is checked)
Max records per batch - This value should be left blank unless a more optimal size for the project/servers has been carefully calculated
Max megabytes per sub-batch - This value should be left blank unless a more optimal size for the project/servers has been carefully calculated

sub_settings.name: Remote REDCap URL (ex: redcap.vanderbilt.edu)
Projects
Project Name - This is required, but is only used for local logging and does not have to exactly match the remote project.
API Key

Record ID Prefix - Optional, but highly recommend if data is coming into the destination project from other sources. This prefix will be prepended to all exported records ids to ensure that they're unique on the destination.
Field List Type - If left blank, the Field List will be ignored

Exclude - All fields will be exported except those listed below

Imports
Imports overwrite local data with remote data. Imports can be configured to occur automatically below, or can be triggered manually via the API Sync page/link in the left menu. Imports may take a long time on large projects. In one test case an import took 15 minutes for a project with about 10,000 records and 1,500 fields.

sub_settings.name: Remote REDCap URL (ex: redcap.vanderbilt.edu)

Daily/Hourly Import Minute (0-59)

• If omitted, neither daily nor hourly imports will occur

Daily Import Hour (0-23)
• The hour on which daily imports will occur
• If omitted, imports will occur hourly

API Key

Record ID Prefix - If data is being imported from multiple projects or entered manually it is highly recommended to specify a record id prefix. This prefix will be prepended to all imported records ids to ensure that they're unique.
